badge: Now available for Windows, macOS & Linux
title: The King of
tagline: AI agents that actually get things done.

messages.main: Create AI agents, chain them into workflows, and let them handle your coding, research, and documentation tasks.
messages.sub: You define what each agent does. Sciorex runs them, tracks progress with tickets, and keeps everything on your machine. No cloud, no subscriptions.

messages.main: Plan entire solutions with your AI agents. Control every decision, track every change, and steer the AI to follow your best practices.
messages.sub: Build applications from the ground up. Define architecture with specialized agents, break work into trackable tickets, and watch your agents deliver.

messages.main: Stop context-switching between tools. One workspace for AI chat, task tracking, and code execution.
messages.sub: Your agents share context, remember decisions, and build on each other's work. Like a team that never forgets.

messages.main: Turn hours of research into minutes. Agents fetch papers, extract insights, and synthesize knowledge automatically.
messages.sub: Feed it sources, get structured summaries. Perfect for literature reviews, competitive analysis, or learning new domains.

messages.main: AI that follows your rules. Define coding standards, review criteria, and workflows your agents must follow.
messages.sub: Every change tracked, every decision logged. Full visibility into what your agents did and why.

messages.main: Full control over every line of code. Review, approve, or reject suggestions made by your AI agents with a powerful diff view.
messages.sub: Keep your code quality high. Your agents propose changes, you maintain the final authority. Perfectly integrated into your development flow.
